summary.what: Pivoted storage from git notes to flat directory files (.timbers/<id>.json)
summary.why: Individual JSON files enable atomic writes, eliminate merge conflicts in concurrent worktrees, and simplify the GitOps interface from 8 to 4 methods
summary.how: New FileStorage with temp+rename atomicity; narrowed GitOps to HEAD/Log/CommitsReachableFrom/GetDiffstat; updated all 26 files including command tests
